songs.title: Trent is Getting Ready Song
songs.lyrics:
[TRENT, spoken]
Hey Rebecca, I'm going to infiltrate your guy friend group tonight. So when in a future time, you see me chilling with them, you'll think, "He's so normal. I'm in love."

(sung)
It's the Trent is getting ready song
The Trent is getting ready song
Trent's getting ready, Trent's getting ready
The Trent is getting ready—

(spoken)
Gah! Oh! Crap, my back
